message: UserSocialAuthOption and AssociationOption in admin.py both use a list_filter value, which is not supported on App Engine and in fact causes an exception to be thrown. Is GAE a target platform for social-auth? If so, perhaps those fields should fail gracefully on GAE. In my case, I simply commented them out, but obviously that is not a good solution for open source. Thanks
I lack the experience on GAE, but if you can come with a better solution, I'll glad to add it to the project.
